names: Jonathan Gao, Nicole Lin
netIDs: jg992, nl392

test cases added:
01111111 + 00000001 = 10000000, CVNZ=0111          127 + 1 = -128
10000000 + 11111111 = 00000000, CVNZ=1101		   -128 + -1 = 0
00000001 + 00000001 = 00000010, CVNZ=0001		   1 + 1 = 2
11111111 + 11111111 = 11111110, CVNZ=1011		   -1 + -1 = -2
00000001 + 11111111 = 00000000, CVNZ=1001		   1 + -1 = 0
